body:
Syntax: cast 'fireball' <target>

Fireball hurls a explosive ball of fire at your target, dealing significant
damage. This is one of the most iconic and powerful offensive spells 
available to magic users.

Classes: Mage, Sorcerer
Level: 15 (Mage), 18 (Sorcerer)
Mana Cost: 30
Position: Standing or Fighting

The fireball's damage increases with your level, making it a devastating
weapon against both single targets and groups. Be careful not to hit
allies in group combat.

See Also: LIGHTNING BOLT, MAGIC MISSILE
